data.name: chat/censorshipMessages
data.value: Censor offensive words in chat messages

data.name: chat/enableStoreChannelsWindows
data.value: Remember position of camera and channel windows

data.name: chat/enableStoreManagementWindows
data.value: Remember position of camera and other windows

data.name: chat/invitesFromFriendsOnly
data.value: Accept invitations from friends in the Garage

data.name: cursor/gunTag/type0
data.value: A-shaped Marker I (with armor penetration indicator)

data.name: sniper/snpGunTag/type0
data.value: A-shaped Marker I (with armor penetration indicator)

data.name: gameplay/domination
data.value: Encounter Battle (after researching Tier IV vehicles)

data.name: game/showVehiclesCounter
data.value: Show vehicle markers on Battle Score Panel

data.name: game/enableDelayPostEffect
data.value: Show in Postmortem mode vehicle that destroyed your vehicle

data.name: COLOR_GRADING_TECHNIQUE/description
data.value:
Change the visual style of the graphics using different color filters.
Does not influence game performance.

data.name: DECALS_QUALITY/description
data.value:
Determines the quality of ingame decals—additional dynamic textures applied to the basic textures.
Decals include potholes, marks of shell penetration, mud, fallen leaves, emblems on vehicles, and other small details.

data.name: EFFECTS_QUALITY/description
data.value:
Determines the display quality of sparks from ricochets, explosions, smoke, and other visual effects.
Reducing the value of this parameter can improve game performance.

data.name: FAR_PLANE/description
data.value: Determines the display distance of relief features, buildings, enemy vehicles and other game objects.

data.name: FLORA_QUALITY/description
data.value:
Determines the density and draw quality of grass and bushes.
Reducing the value of this parameter can improve game performance.

data.name: LIGHTING_QUALITY/description
data.value:
Accuracy of setting sun rays, lighting, and optical effects.
Increasing the value of this parameter considerably increases load on video card.

data.name: MOTION_BLUR_QUALITY/description
data.value: Determines the quality of motion blur effect of an image when a vehicle moves and camera rotates.

data.name: OBJECT_LOD/description
data.value: Determines the number of displayed objects and their quality.

data.name: POST_PROCESSING_QUALITY/description
data.value:
Determines the quality of fog, glow effects, and other post-processing visual effects.
Reducing the value of this parameter can improve game performance.

data.name: RENDER_PIPELINE/description
data.value:
Improved: allows for maximum image quality.
Standard: allows for maximum performance by simplifying or disabling some visual effects.

data.name: RENDER_PIPELINE/warning
data.value: Change of this parameter will be applied upon game restart.

data.name: SHADOWS_QUALITY/description
data.value:
Determines the quality of dynamic shadow processing over the entire draw distance. Full disabling of shadows can cause strong visual inconsistency.
Reducing the value of this parameter can considerably improve game performance.

data.name: SNIPER_MODE_EFFECTS_QUALITY/description
data.value:
Determines the display quality of sparks from ricochets, explosions, smoke, and other realistic effects in Sniper mode.
Reducing the value of this parameter can improve the game performance.

data.name: SNIPER_MODE_GRASS_ENABLED/description
data.value:
Displays grass in Sniper mode.
Disabling this parameter can improve game performance.

data.name: SPEEDTREE_QUALITY/description
data.value: Determines the draw quality of foliage.

data.name: TERRAIN_QUALITY/description
data.value:
Determines the draw quality of map relief features.
Use the minimum landscape quality only in the case of low computer performance.
Reducing the value of this parameter can cause desynchronization of landscape display between client and server.

data.name: TERRAIN_QUALITY/warning
data.value: Applying the specified parameter may take some time.

data.name: TEXTURE_QUALITY/description
data.value:
Quality of surfaces of game objects, especially under close examination.
Reducing the value of this parameter can improve game performance.

data.name: TEXTURE_QUALITY/warning
data.value: Applying the specified parameter may take some time.

data.name: VEHICLE_DUST_ENABLED/description
data.value:
Displays ground, snow, and water splashes behind the tracks.
Disabling this parameter can improve game performance.

data.name: VEHICLE_TRACES_ENABLED/description
data.value:
Displays track traces on the ground.
Unavailable in the Standard graphics preset and at the low decals quality.

data.name: WATER_QUALITY/description
data.value: Determines the draw quality of water surfaces.

data.name: aspectRatio/description
data.value:
Select height-to-width aspect ratio of the image. Mismatch of set height-to-width aspect ratio with your current display ratio can cause horizontal compression or stretching of the image.
Does not influence game performance.

data.name: autodetectButton/description
data.value:
Determines optimum image quality for your computer.
This may take some time.

data.name: colorFilterIntensity/description
data.value: Change efficiency of the selected color filter.

data.name: dynamicRenderer/description
data.value:
Determines game scene quality and details.
3D render resolution in a battle can be changed by using [RShift +] and [RShift -]. Does not influence the interface.
Reducing this parameter can improve game performance for computers with a low-performance video card.

data.name: fov/description
data.value:
Visibility range of game camera.
95° is the normal FoV (field of view). The smaller the FoV, the closer objects appear, while peripheral view is reduced.
Does not influence game performance.

data.name: fpsPerfomancer/description
data.value: Automatic simplification of effects with low system performance.

data.name: fullScreen/description
data.value: Switching between fullscreen and windowed modes. Game performance is decreased in a windowed mode.

data.name: game/enableOpticalSnpEffect
data.value: Enable optics effect in Sniper mode

data.name: gamma/description
data.value:
Change image brightness. Can be used in a fullscreen mode only.
In a windowed mode, current operating system settings are used.

data.name: graphicsQuality/description
data.value:
Determines the general quality of the image.
Determines the parameters of the Details tab.
Reducing graphics quality can improve game performance.
Use the minimum graphics quality only in the case of low computer performance.
Reducing the value of this parameter can cause desynchronization of landscape display between client and server.

data.name: isColorBlind/description
data.value: Adaptation of the color palette for people with color vision deficiency.

data.name: monitor/description
data.value: Select the primary display for the game.

data.name: refreshRate/description
data.value:
Display refresh rate in the game.
Mismatch with display refresh rate can cause a blinking screen effect.
Does not influence game performance.

data.name: resolution/description
data.value:
Horizontal and vertical screen resolution in a fullscreen mode. Higher resolution improves image quality. Mismatch of set resolution in a fullscreen mode with current display resolution can distort the image.
Increasing this parameter increases load on video card and can reduce game performance.
Load on video card can be reduced by setting 3D render resolution.

data.name: smoothing/description
data.value: Determines degree of additional processing of thin lines and contours of game objects. Minimizes aliasing effect. Contours of objects look more natural.

data.name: vertSync/description
data.value:
Synchronization of frame rate with display refresh rate.
60 frames per second is the frame rate limit. This option may help correct a shaking image effect or image delay at the bottom of the screen relative to the top.

data.name: windowSize/description
data.value: Horizontal and vertical screen resolution of game client window. When switching to a fullscreen mode, the setting changes to "Screen Resolution".

data.name: dynamicFov/description
data.value:
Dynamic FoV allows you to set the minimum and maximum view angle in Arcade aim.
Maximum angle is used when the camera is zoomed away from the vehicle.
Minimum angle is used when zoomed in to the vehicle.

data.name: SEMITRANSPARENT_LEAVES_ENABLED/description
data.value:
Determines how foliage for nearby trees and bushes is displayed.
Disabling this parameter displays the foliage of nearby trees and bushes as completely invisible, which can improve game performance.

data.name: HAVOK_ENABLED/description
data.value:
Enables a more realistic model of object destruction and interaction on the Stalingrad map.
Disabling this parameter can improve game performance.

data.name: tripleBuffered/description
data.value: Decreases tearing on frame change (available only with vertical synchronization enabled).

data.name: game/showSectorOnMap
data.value: Display arc of fire for the SPG on the minimap

data.name: game/showVectorOnMap
data.value: Display camera direction beam on the minimap

data.name: interfaceScale/attention
data.value: Feature is undergoing testing; it does not influence game performance.

data.name: interfaceScale/body
data.value: Automatic scaling of interface elements when maximizing game screen/window.

data.name: interfaceScale/description
data.value: Automatic scaling of interface elements when maximizing game screen/window.

data.name: interfaceScale/warning
data.value: Feature is undergoing testing; it does not influence game performance.

data.name: chat/chatContactsListOnly
data.value: Receive messages only from the Contact list

data.name: chat/receiveInvitesInBattle
data.value: Accept invitations to Platoon in battle

data.name: graphicsQualityHDSD/description
data.value:
Standard Client—full game without maximum-quality textures.
HD Client (Beta)—full game including maximum-quality textures. Requires more space on the hard drive than the Standard Client.

data.name: DRR_AUTOSCALER_ENABLED/description
data.value:
Enable or disable automatic adjustment of 3D render resolution.
Enabling this parameter can improve game performance.

data.name: interfaceScaleDisabled/body
data.value: Automatic scaling of interface elements when maximizing game screen/window.

data.name: interfaceScaleDisabled/description
data.value: Automatic scaling of interface elements when maximizing game screen/window.

data.name: game/battleLoadingInfo
data.value: Tips on the Battle Loading Screen

data.name: game/minimapGroupTitle
data.value: View range Indicators on the Minimap

data.name: keyboard/keysBlocks/command/voicechat_enable
data.value: Enable/disable voice chat in Dynamic Platoons

data.name: soundQuality/description
data.value: Disabling this parameter can improve game performance.

data.name: game/showSimplifiedVehParams
data.value: Show simplified technical characteristics in the Garage

data.name: game/sniperModeByShift
data.value: Restrict toggling the Sniper mode to the Shift key

data.name: feedback/tab/battleEvents/info
data.value: The three most recent events are displayed in a battle

data.name: feedback/tab/detailsInfoBlock
data.value: A block for detailed damage information. Shows complete information about your effectiveness in battle.

data.name: sounds/bassBoost/description
data.value: Enhances low frequencies in game with the master volume remaining the same. The mode implementation may differ depending on the selected sound system (speakers, headphones, or laptop).

data.name: sounds/bulbVoices/description
data.value: Select one of variants for the Sixth Sense activation sound. To use your own sound, rename your .mp3 file to sixthSense and move it to the res/audioww folder.

data.name: sounds/masterVolumeToggle/description
data.value: Disabling game sound effects may improve the overall game performance. You will have to restart the game client for the changes to apply.

data.name: sounds/nightMode/description
data.value: Levels out volume differences, reduces sharp sounds, and minimizes low frequencies in game, providing a comfortable and soft sound environment for late night gaming.

data.name: sounds/soundDevice/acoustics/body
data.value: Adjusts the in-game sound for external paired full-range speakers (2.0) or paired high frequency speakers + one low frequency speaker (2.1).

data.name: sounds/soundDevice/headphones/body
data.value: Adjusts the in-game sound for headphones.

data.name: sounds/soundDevice/laptop/body
data.value: Uses the positioning principle of the 2.0/2.1 Sound System preset but adjusts the in-game sound for playback on small laptop speakers at the highest quality possible.

data.name: sounds/soundQuality/description
data.value: Reducing the sound quality may improve the overall game performance on low-end computers. Enabling this mode significantly reduces the number of sounds processed simultaneously.

data.name: feedback/tab/damageLogPanel/screenAlert
data.value: Enabling this setting is not recommended for displays with a low resolution

data.name: game/carouselVehicle/checkbox/stats
data.value: Display stats upon hovering over a slot in the Garage

data.name: screenMode/description
data.value: Switching between full-screen, windowed and windowed (borderless) game modes. The windowed game mode will reduce game performance.

data.name: sounds/soundDevice/acoustics20/body
data.value: Adjusts the in-game sound for external paired full-range speakers (2.0) or paired high frequency speakers + one low frequency speaker (2.1).

data.name: sounds/soundDevice/acoustics51/body
data.value: Adjusts the positioning of in-game sound for the external speakers and subwoofer in the multichannel 5.1 system.

data.name: sounds/soundDevice/acoustics71/body
data.value: Adjusts the positioning of in-game sound for the external speakers and subwoofer in the multichannel 7.1 system.

data.name: sounds/soundDevice/auto/body
data.value: Automatically determines the audio configuration settings, specified in the operating system.

data.name: sounds/speakers/back/body
data.value: Sound test on right/left rear speakers.

data.name: sounds/speakers/center/body
data.value: Sound test on the central speaker.

data.name: sounds/speakers/front/body
data.value: Sound test on right/left front speakers.

data.name: sounds/speakers/optionalsub/body
data.value: In the 2.0/2.1 system, a subwoofer presents an optional device. It cannot be tested without speakers.

data.name: sounds/speakers/sidelong/body
data.value: Sound test on right/left side speakers.

data.name: sounds/altVoice/NationalDefault/body
data.value: Voice messages depend on a vehicle's nation and the commander's gender

data.name: sounds/altVoice/default/body
data.value: Male voice in the game client's language

data.name: sounds/sixthSense/body
data.value: Custom sound. Move the sixthSense.mp3 file to the resaudioww folder.

data.name: game/battleLoadingRankedInfo
data.value: Tips on the Ranked Battle loading screen
